data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do CD das Aves.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Aves to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
The match at Estadio do CD das Aves has been interrupted briefly for a check on Maracas, who is down injured.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Aves.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Aves throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Maracas is back on his feet again.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Vila das Aves a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Aves.
Estrela (Aves) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila das Aves.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
Aves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Aves's Welinton Junior goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Aves.
Can Aves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do CD das Aves.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Aves in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Can Aves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Aves to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Aves have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Joao Pinheiro signals a throw-in for Aves, close to Pacos Ferreira's area.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Aves throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Aves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Aves in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Aves in their own half.
Can Aves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Joao Pinheiro waits before resuming play because Helder Ferreira for Pacos Ferreira is still down.
Pacos Ferreira's Helder Ferreira looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Aves.
Maracas is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Aves territory.
Maracas returns to the field for Pacos Ferreira after picking up a slight injury.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Aves's half.
Goal! Pedrinho gives Pacos Ferreira a 0-1 lead in Vila das Aves.
Ball safe as Aves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Vila das Aves, Douglas Tanque of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Aves in Vila das Aves.
Aves have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Joao Pinheiro awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Free kick Aves.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do CD das Aves.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
In Vila das Aves, Maracas (Pacos Ferreira) misses the target with a header.
Aves have a goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Aves.
Joao Pinheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Aves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Vila das Aves a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ruben Macedo is booked for the home team.
Joao Pinheiro blows against Pacos Ferreira's Mohamed Diaby for offside.
Free kick for Aves in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira's Jorge Silva has been booked in Vila das Aves.
Aves have a dangerous throw-in.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
Welinton Junior gets an equalizer for Aves. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Ruben Macedo to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do CD das Aves.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Vila das Aves.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila das Aves.
Aves needs to be cautious. Pacos Ferreira have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In Vila das Aves, Marcelo (Pacos Ferreira) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
The first-half has come to a close in Vila das Aves.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Joao Pinheiro awards Aves a goal kick.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Aves in their own half.
Aves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Aves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Helder Ferreira.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Aves.
Throw-in for Aves in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira push forward at Estadio do CD das Aves and Douglas Tanque gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Aves defence.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Aves's half?
Aves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Pacos Ferreira defence as Estrela fires in a strike for Aves.
Joao Pinheiro signals a throw-in for Aves, close to Pacos Ferreira's area.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick for Aves in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Marius Mouandilmadji is replacing Arthur Kevin Yamga for the home team.
Aves make their second substitution with Pedro Delgado replacing Zidane Banjaqui.
Throw-in for Aves close to the penalty box.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aves have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Aves surge into the attack at Estadio do CD das Aves but Oumar Diakhite’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Aves throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Free kick Aves.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Aves territory.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aves's half?
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Aves at Estadio do CD das Aves.
The away team replace Jorge Silva with Uilton.
Pacos Ferreira pushes forward through Douglas Tanque, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira's Luiz Carlos misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Aves at Estadio do CD das Aves.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Can Aves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Aves in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira needs to be cautious. Aves have an attacking throw-in.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Aves.
Throw-in for Aves in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Ball safe as Aves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Aves throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Aves territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
An attacking Pacos Ferreira player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Attention is being given to Pacos Ferreira’s Helder Ferreira and play has been suspended briefly.
Pacos Ferreira are going well in Vila das Aves. They now lead 1-3 thanks to a Adriano penalty.
Helder Ferreira, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Murilo Freitas is the substitute for Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in high up the field for Pacos Ferreira in Vila das Aves.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Pacos Ferreira's Murilo Freitas is whistled for offside at Estadio do CD das Aves.
Aves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Vila das Aves a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Aves have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Aves.
Throw-in for Aves at Estadio do CD das Aves.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Aves in their own half.
Aaron Tshibola is on a sub for Ruben Oliveira for Aves.
Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Douglas Tanque's finish is wide of the goal.
Joao Pinheiro awards Aves a goal kick.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Corner awarded to Aves.
Aves's Pedro Delgado gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pacos Ferreira defender.
Throw-in for Aves in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Aves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila das Aves.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Can Aves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Jailson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Jailson (Aves) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Joao Pinheiro signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Aves's half.
Pepa (Pacos Ferreira) is making a third substitution, with Joao Amaral replacing Adriano.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
Aves’s Jailson is on his feet again at Estadio do CD das Aves.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Aves's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Aves territory.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The match is over. Final score 1-3.
